articles.title: Yasir Shah keen to play for Pakistan again - DAWN.com
articles.description: Yasir boasts an exceptional record in Sri Lanka and bagged 24 wickets when Pakistan last played them in 2015.
articles.content:
RAWALPINDI: Pakistan leg-spinner Yasir Shah is eager to represent the national side after nearly a years gap when they tour Sri Lanka for a two-match Test series next month.

articles.title: ‘Dinesh Karthik demands a place in India's T20 World Cup squad' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Dinesh Karthik was recalled to the India team after a strong season in the IPL with RCB, where he scored at a strike rate in excess of 180 throughout the tournament.
